lyrics.text: First listen and then answer the question, Why will the police have a difficult time?
lyrics.translation: 首先听录音，然后回答问题，为什么警察会有困难？

lyrics.text: The Greenwood Boys are a group of pop singers.
lyrics.translation: 绿林少年是一个流行歌手组合。

lyrics.text: At present, they are visiting all parts of the country.
lyrics.translation: 目前，他们正在访问国家的各个地区。

lyrics.text: They will be arriving here tomorrow.
They will be coming by train and most of the young people in the town will be meeting them
lyrics.translation: 他们将乘火车来，镇上的大部分年轻人将去迎接他们。

lyrics.text: Tomorrow evening they will be singing at the workers' club.
lyrics.translation: 明天晚上他们将在工人俱乐部唱歌。

lyrics.text: The Greenwood Boys will be staying for five days.
During this time, they will give five performances.
lyrics.translation: 在这段时间里，他们将进行五场演出。

lyrics.text: As usual, the police will have a difficult time.
lyrics.translation: 像往常一样，警察将会有一段艰难的时光。

lyrics.text: They will be trying to keep order.
It is always the same on these occasions.
lyrics.translation: 在这些场合，情况总是相同的。
